get.description: Get user information using the access token from the request cookie.

schema.title: Response User Info Auth Me Get

post.description:
Endpoint to retrieve all venues.

Args:
    username (str): The username of the user attempting to log in.
    password (str): The password of the user.

Returns:
    List[VenueSchema]: A list of all venues.

put.description:
Endpoint to create a new venue.

Args:
    venue_data (Any): The venue data to be created.
    categories (Any): The categories associated with the venue.
    images (Optional[list[UploadFile]]): The images to be uploaded for the venue.

Returns:
    Any: The created venue data.

get.description: Retrieve all venue categories.

schema.title: Response Get Categories Venues Categories Get

get.description: Retrieve all venue optionals.

schema.title: Response Get Optionals Venues Optionals Get

get.description:
Endpoint to retrieve a specific venue by its ID.

Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to retrieve.

Returns:
    VenueSchema: The data of the requested venue.

delete.description:
Endpoint to delete a venue by its ID.
Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to delete.
Returns:
    bool: True if the venue was successfully deleted, False otherwise.

patch.description:
Endpoint to update an existing venue. All parameters are optional.

Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to be updated.
    venue_data (Optional[VenuePatchSchema]): The updated venue data.
    categories (Optional[list[int]]): The updated categories associated with the venue.
    optionals (Optional[list[int]]): The updated optionals associated with the venue.

Returns:
    Any: The updated venue data.

get.description:
Endpoint to retrieve events associated with a specific venue by its ID.

Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to retrieve events for.
    limit (int): Number of events per page.
    page (int): Page number for pagination.

Returns:
    List of events associated with the venue.

put.description:
Endpoint to create a new custom venue.

Args:
    venue_data (Any): The venue data to be created.
    categories (Optional[list[int]]): The categories associated with the venue.
    optionals (Optional[list[int]]): The optionals associated with the venue.
    images (Optional[list[UploadFile]]): The images to be uploaded for the venue.

Returns:
    VenueResponseSchema: The created custom venue data.

get.description:
Endpoint to retrieve the days availability for a specific venue.
Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to check availability for.
Returns:
    List of available days for the venue.

Endpoint to retrieve the hours availability for a specific venue on a given day.
Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to check availability for.
    day (date): The specific day to check availability.
Returns:
    List of available hours for the venue on the specified day.

Endpoint to check the availability of a venue for a given reservation.
Args:
    reservation_id (int): The ID of the reservation to check availability for.
Returns:
    bool: True if the venue is available (200), False otherwise (202).

Endpoint to check the availability of a venue for a given event.
Args:
    event_id (int): The ID of the event to check availability for.
Returns:
    bool: True if the venue is available (200), False otherwise (202).

patch.description:
Update an existing venue image by its venue ID and image ID.

Returns:
    Confirmation message or status code indicating success or failure.

delete.description:
Delete a venue image by its venue ID and image ID.

Returns:
    Confirmation message or status code indicating success or failure.

get.description:
Endpoint to retrieve working hours for a specific venue.

Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to retrieve working hours for.
Returns:
    List[VenueWorkingHoursSchema]: The working hours data of the requested venue.

schema.title: Response Get Venue Hours Venues  Venue Id  Hours Get

put.description:
Endpoint to create working hours for a specific venue.

Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to create working hours for.
    hours_data (VenueWorkingHoursCreateSchema): The working hours data to be created.
Returns:
    Any: The created working hours data.

patch.description:
Endpoint to update working hours for a specific venue.

Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to update working hours for.
    hours_data (VenueWorkingHoursPatchSchema): The working hours data to be updated.
Returns:
    Any: The updated working hours data.

post.description:
Endpoint to retrieve all providers.

Args:
    username (str): The username of the user attempting to log in.
    password (str): The password of the user.

Returns:
    List[ProviderSchema]: A list of all providers.

put.description:
Endpoint to create a new provider.
Args:
    provider (ProviderSchema): The provider data to be created.
    images (Optional[list[UploadFile]]): List of images to be associated with the provider.
Returns:
    ProviderSchema: The created provider data.

get.description:
Endpoint per ottenere un provider specifico tramite il suo ID.

Args:
    provider_id (int): L'ID del provider.

Returns:
    ProviderSchema: I dati del provider richiesto.

delete.description:
Endpoint to delete a provider by its ID.
Args:
    provider_id (int): The ID of the provider to delete.
Returns:
    bool: True if the provider was successfully deleted, False otherwise.

patch.description:
Endpoint to update an existing provider. All parameters are optional.

Args:
    provider_id (int): The ID of the provider to be updated.
    provider_data (Optional[ProviderSchema]): The updated provider data.

Returns:
    Any: The updated provider data.

get.description:
Endpoint per ottenere un provider specifico tramite l'ID utente.

Args:
    provider_id (int): L'ID del provider.

Returns:
    ProviderSchema: I dati del provider richiesto.

schema.title: Response Get Provider By User Id Providers User  Provider Id  Get

get.description:
Endpoint per ottenere tutti i servizi offerti da un provider.

Args:
    provider_id (int): L'ID del provider.

Returns:
    Lista di servizi associati al provider.

Endpoint per ottenere tutti i servizi offerti da un provider.

Args:
    provider_id (int): L'ID del provider.
    service_id (int): L'ID del servizio.
Returns:
    Lista di servizi associati al provider.

Endpoint per ottenere un servizio specifico tramite il suo ID.

Args:
    provider_service_id (int): L'ID del servizio del provider.

Returns:
    I dati del servizio richiesto.

delete.description:
Endpoint to delete a provider service by its ID.
Args:
    provider_service_id (int): The ID of the provider service to delete.
Returns:
    bool: True if the provider service was successfully deleted, False otherwise.

patch.description:
Endpoint to update an existing provider service. All parameters are optional.

Args:
    provider_service_id (int): The ID of the provider service to be updated.
    provider_service_data (Optional[ProviderServicePatchSchema]): The updated provider service data.

Returns:
    Any: The updated provider service data.

put.description:
Endpoint to create a new provider service.
Args:
    provider_service_data (Any): The provider service data to be created.
    images (Optional[list[UploadFile]]): List of images to be associated with the provider service.
Returns:
    ProviderServiceSchema: The created provider service data.

get.description:
Endpoint to retrieve events associated with a specific provider by its ID.

Args:
    provider_id (int): The ID of the provider to retrieve events for.
    limit (int): Number of events per page.
    page (int): Page number for pagination.

Returns:
    List of events associated with the venue.

patch.description:
Endpoint to update an existing provider image.

Args:
    provider_id (int): The ID of the provider to be updated.
    image_id (int): The ID of the image to be updated.
    image_data (Optional[UploadFile]): The updated image file.

Returns:
    Any: The updated provider image data.

delete.description:
Endpoint to delete an existing provider image.

Args:
    provider_id (int): The ID of the provider.
    image_id (int): The ID of the image to be deleted.

Returns:
    bool: True if the provider image was successfully deleted, False otherwise.

patch.description:
Endpoint to update an existing provider service image.

Args:
    provider_service_id (int): The ID of the provider service to be updated.
    image_id (int): The ID of the image to be updated.
    image_data (Optional[UploadFile]): The updated image file.

Returns:
    Any: The updated provider service image data.

delete.description:
Endpoint to delete an existing provider service image.

Args:
    provider_service_id (int): The ID of the provider service.
    image_id (int): The ID of the image to be deleted.

Returns:
    bool: True if the provider service image was successfully deleted, False otherwise.

get.description:
Endpoint to retrieve the days availability for a specific service with service payment type = DAY.
Args:
    provider_id (int): The ID of the provider to check availability for.
Returns:
    List of available days for the provider.

Endpoint to retrieve the hours availability for a specific provider on a given day.
Args:
    provider_id (int): The ID of the provider to check availability for.
    day (date): The specific day to check availability.
Returns:
    List of available hours for the provider on the specified day.

Endpoint to check the availability of a provider service for a given reservation.

Args:
    reservation_id (int): The ID of the reservation to check availability for.
Returns:
    bool: True if the provider service is available (200), False otherwise (202).

schema.title: Response Check Provider Service Availability Providers Service Availability Check Get

get.description:
Endpoint to check the availability of a provider service for a given event.

Args:
    event_id (int): The ID of the event to check availability for.
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to check availability for.
Returns:
    bool: True if the provider service is available (200), False otherwise (202).

schema.title: Response Check Service Event Availability Providers Service Availability Event Check Get

put.description:
Endpoint to create working hours for a specific provider service.

Args:
    provider_service_id (int): The ID of the provider service to create working hours for.
    hours_data (ProviderServiceWorkingHoursCreateSchema): The working hours data to be created.
Returns:
    Any: The created working hours data.

get.description:
Endpoint to retrieve working hours for a specific provider service.

Args:
    provider_service_id (int): The ID of the provider service to retrieve working hours for.
Returns:
    Any: The working hours data.

schema.title: Response Get Provider Service Hours Providers Service  Provider Service Id  Hours Get

patch.description:
Endpoint to update working hours for a specific provider service.

Args:
    provider_service_id (int): The ID of the provider service to update working hours for.
    hours_data (ProviderServiceWorkingHoursPatchSchema): The working hours data to be updated.
Returns:
    Any: The updated working hours data.

post.description:
Endpoint to retrieve all reservations for a specific venue.

Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to retrieve reservations for.

Returns:
    List of reservations associated with the given venue.

put.description:
Endpoint to create a specific venue reservation.

Args:
    venue_id (int): The ID of the venue to create reservations for.

Returns:
    created reservation information.

delete.description:
Endpoint to delete a specific venue reservation.
Args:
    reservation_id (int): The ID of the reservation to delete.
Returns:
    Confirmation message indicating successful deletion.

patch.description:
Endpoint to update a specific venue reservation.

Args:
    reservation_id (int): The ID of the reservation to update.
    update_data (dict): The data to update the reservation with.

Returns:
    Updated reservation information.

post.description:
Endpoint to retrieve all provider reservations.

Args:
    username (str): The username of the user attempting to log in.
    password (str): The password of the user.

Returns:
    List of reservations associated with the given provider.

schema.title: Response All Provider Reservations Reservations Provider Post

put.description:
Endpoint to create a specific provider reservation.

    provider_id (int): The ID of the provider to create reservations for.

Returns:
    created reservation information.

delete.description:
Endpoint to delete a specific provider reservation.
Args:
    reservation_id (int): The ID of the reservation to delete.

    Confirmation message indicating successful deletion.

patch.description:
Endpoint to update a specific provider reservation.

Args:
    reservation_id (int): The ID of the reservation to update.
    update_data (dict): The data to update the reservation with.

Returns:
    Updated reservation information.

post.description:
Endpoint to retrieve all events.

Args:
    filter: Filtering criteria for events.
    limit: Number of events per page.
    page: Page number for pagination.

Returns:
    List of events.

put.description:
Create a new event with optional images.
Receives event data as JSON or object in the body and an array of image files.

get.description:
Endpoint to retrieve a specific event by its ID.

Args:
    event_id (int): The ID of the event to retrieve.

Returns:
    EventSchema: The data of the requested venue.

delete.description:
Delete an event by its ID.

Args:
    event_id (int): The ID of the event to delete.

Returns:
    Confirmation message or status code indicating success or failure.

patch.description:
Update an existing event by its ID.

Returns:
    Confirmation message or status code indicating success or failure.

Update an existing event image by its event ID and image ID.

Returns:
    Confirmation message or status code indicating success or failure.

delete.description:
Delete an event image by its event ID and image ID.

Returns:
    Confirmation message or status code indicating success or failure.

get.description:
Retrieve all event categories.

Returns:
    List of event categories.

Retrieve venues associated with a specific event.

Args:
    event_id (int): The ID of the event.

Returns:
    List of venues associated with the event.

Retrieve services associated with a specific event.

Args:
    event_id (int): The ID of the event.

Returns:
    List of services associated with the event.

put.description:
Endpoint to create a new venue transaction.
Args:
    transaction_data (dict): Data for the new venue transaction.
Returns:
    The created venue transaction.

post.description:
Endpoint to retrieve all transactions for a specific venue.

Args:
    venue_id (int): L'ID della venue di cui recuperare le transazioni.

Returns:
    List of transactions associated with the given venue.
